import React from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import FetchSingleMovieDetails from '../../hooks/detailMovie' const WatchMovie=({movieId}:{movieId:any})=>{ const { data:movie, isLoading,isError:errorMessage } = FetchSingleMovieDetails(movieId) return ( <>
{movie && movie.title}

HD

Country: {movie && movie.production_countries[0].namee}

{movie && movie.vote_average}

{movie && movie.overview}

Country: {movie && movie.production_companies[0].name}

Genre: {movie && movie.genres[0].name}

Score: {movie && movie.vote_average}

Read more */}
) } export default WatchMovie
